name: LUDO Dice
description:
This app is a fun 3D dice but when you connect it to the LUDO Family Board Game for Apple TV it turns into a remote controller. LUDO Dice will automatically find a LUDO running on a Apple TV if both devices are on the same network (home WiFi).

-> If you have Apple TV, go to App Store on your Apple TV and search and install 'LUDO, family board game'

You can use up to 4 iPhone or iPad LUDO Dice Remote controllers to play the game. It is easy and super fun!


* You have to be on the same network as Apple TV to connect to the game.
